Class PNMWithMaxValueDataAccess

java.lang.Object
ch.supsi.dataaccess.image.PNMDataAccess
ch.supsi.dataaccess.image.PNMWithMaxValueDataAccess
All Implemented Interfaces:
ImageDataAccess
Direct Known Subclasses:
PGMDataAccess, PPMDataAccess
public abstract sealed class PNMWithMaxValueDataAccess extends PNMDataAccess permits PPMDataAccess, PGMDataAccess
Abstract base class for handling PNM image formats that include a "max value" field in their headers. This class extends PNMDataAccess and provides shared functionality for formats like PPM and PGM, which support pixel values up to a defined maximum.
See Also:
  • PNMDataAccess
  • PPMDataAccess
  • PGMDataAccess
